Summary: disc with yellow lights around rim and bright white searchlight
divs: Sighting Detailsmy sister was just getting home and was outside in the driveway. she saw an object to the west wich barely cleared the mountain, about a half mile away. it was large and she could make out yellow lights running horizontally across the object. it got closer and she said it suddenly turned on a bright white light, kind of like a headlight. it was on for just a little bit and it then turned off all lights altogether. she could still see the path of it when it got about 200 yards from our house. she said it was moving very slowly. it was just above the treeline and she could easily see the shape of the object. she described it as a dark round object that was about 8 feet tall and fairly large. it got a little ways past our house and she said it just vanished. i beleive my sister to be very credible.
trends: There have been no other sightings in bloserville
This sighting has never been favorited.
